title: The 5 best deals and sales happening this weekend
text:
The 5 best deals and sales happening this weekend

Save on designer bags and high-end cookware with these sales. (Photo: Kate Spade / Williams-Sonoma)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

The end of the workweek means two things: The end of working and pay day! I typically try to only spend my hard earned cash on sales, so I don't blow it all in one place. As a deal hunter by nature, I like to shop smart and choose the best retailers with the best prices. This Friday, you can score incredible savings at popular stores like Kate Spade, Wayfair, Williams-Sonoma, and more.

1. 30% off: Kate Spade purses, wallets, and more

Save big on new wallets and purses for the season. (Photo: Kate Spade)

Kate Spade sells some of the most iconic purses, wallets, and accessories—but they rarely go on sale. That's why I was ecstatic to see that they're offering 30% off everything as part of their Friends and Family sale with the code WEAREFAMILY. This is a big deal and I will be upping my bag game for the fall with a fluffy saddle bag or sparkly wallet.

Get 30% off at Kate Spade with the code WEAREFAMILY

2. Up to 70% off holiday decor at Wayfair

It may only be October, but it's never too early to think about the holidays. (Photo: Wayfair)

The best time to start decorating your home for the holidays is early—or at least it is according to Wayfair. Right now, the massive online furniture retailer is offering up to 70% off holiday decor as part of their Head Start Holiday Sale. That means you can get incredible prices on a new faux tree, seasonal table settings, and even storage, so you have a place to put all this stuff. If it's too early for you, you can also save with their Fall Refresh Sale, too.

Shop the Wayfair Head Start Holiday Sale

3. Save big on All-Clad, Le Creuset, and more at Williams-Sonoma

Save big on these iconic cookware pieces and more. (Photo: Williams-Sonoma)

Cookware brands like Staub, All-Clad, and Le Creuset can see unattainable at times due to their high price points. But right now, you can get up to 65% off those brands at more with Williams-Sonoma's cookware sale. There's a lot to shop, but I'm eyeing these nonstick All-Clad pans and our favorite Dutch oven from Staub.

Shop the Williams-Sonoma cookware sale

4. Get $100 off any order over $500 at Nectar

Make your bed a little bit more cozy this fall and winter with a brand new mattress from Nectar. (Photo: Nectar)

During the fall and winter, you can most likely find me in bed with a cozy blanket. But to really feel snuggled up, I need to have a comfortable mattress. We chose Nectar as the absolute best mattress in a box of 2019, beating out other popular brands like Casper and Purple. Until October 15, you can save $100 on any Nectar mattress with two premium memory foam pillows included, on the Nectar website. With prices as low as $399 for a twin, along with free shipping, you won't want to sleep on this deal, pun intended.

Shop Nectar mattresses and save $100 on a $500 purchase

5. 20% off: Buy more, save more on meat thermometers

You honestly can't have grilling season without a good meat thermometer. (Photo: Reviewed)

When it comes to cooking succulent steaks and juicy burgers, we don't mess around and always use an accurate meat thermometer. Thermoworks makes the best of the best, and right now their running an incredible buy more, save more sale. You can get 10% off $50 or more, 15% off $100 or more, and 20% off $200 or more. This is honestly a great time to pick up a thermometer for yourself and some gifts for your meat loving loved ones. Shop our favorites like the Pop, the Thermapen Mk4, the ChefAlarm, and the Dot.

Get up to 20% off at Thermoworks

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
